doc.title: Interrogation
doc.plot: A curious young Cheer Leader wanders in to the Den of Iniquity Dungeon in New York City. She is discovered by Mistress Arianna and interogated as to the nature of her motives. After a thorough questioning and torture session, she is robbed of her cheer leading uniform which Arianna has been secretly coveting. Head Mistress Tara returns to her dungeon to find Arianna donning the skirt. Confused by where and how the young blonde has aquired this garment, Tara takes a crack at Arianna herself. She is also questioned as to Mistress Tara's slave Cheryl's coming and going in her absence. Not satisfied with the results of her query, Ms. Indiana and Arianna set out to get their answers from the source: little Miss Cheryl Lynn Kahn. They set their talent to it and the rest is Fetish history
